citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
Required records including the complete list of animals on hand and veterinary approved avian enrichment plan were not
available for review at the time of inspection. Access to the required records ensures accountability for animals and
husbandry care. The facility must ensure that the required records are available at the time of inspection.
Correct by October 18, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
Required records including the complete list of animals on hand and veterinary approved avian enrichment plan were not

husbandry care. The facility must ensure that the required records are available at the time of inspection.

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
